verses.name: Exodus 40:17
verses.text: And it came to pass in the first month in the second year, on the first day of the month, that the tabernacle was reared up.

verses.name: Exodus 40:18
verses.text: And Moses reared up the tabernacle, and fastened his sockets, and set up the boards thereof, and put in the bars thereof, and reared up his pillars.

verses.name: Exodus 40:19
verses.text: And he spread abroad the tent over the tabernacle, and put the covering of the tent above upon it; as the Lord commanded Moses.
